law.catch_line: Interstate compacts on solid waste management.
law.text: The Governor is authorized to negotiate and enter into compacts with other states relating to the management of solid waste including reduction, collection, transportation, and disposal. Such compacts must be ratified by the General Assembly.
law.history: Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 19, effective February 26, 1991.
